spf_record.purpose: Prevents email spoofing for hihoney1146@gmail.com domain
instructions: 1. Log in to your domain registrar (where hihoney.site is registered)
2. Navigate to DNS settings / DNS management
4. Save changes and wait for DNS propagation (up to 48 hours)
5. Verify using: dig TXT hihoney.site or nslookup -type=txt hihoney.site
spf_record.note: This is a DNS configuration, not a code change. Must be done in domain registrar settings.
